sentences.english: Dawn is the first light in the sky as the sun rises.
sentences.chinese: 當太陽昇起，天剛亮的時候叫做黎明。

sentences.english: When it was light enough Johnsy mercilessly commanded that the shade be raised.
sentences.chinese: 天剛亮，瓊西毫不留情地命令把窗簾拉起來。

sentences.english: At the crack of dawn, we get up to open our presents.
sentences.chinese: 天剛亮，我們就起牀去打開禮物。

sentences.english: I hated that camp; they always routed us up at day break .
sentences.chinese: 我討厭那個兵營，他們總是天剛亮就把我們鬧起牀。

sentences.english: Morning, the group has asked me why I was up at dawn on them?
sentences.chinese: 早上有團友問我爲什麼天剛亮就起來了呢？

sentences.english: The day dawned and the birds were singing.
When day dawned, we started our journey.
sentences.chinese: 天剛亮我們就動身去旅行。

sentences.english: The twins began bawling at the break of day.
sentences.chinese: 天剛亮，雙胞胎就開始哭嚎。
